meaningMnemonic: You should <kanji>deal with</kanji> and change your <kanji>treatment</kanji> of certain people depending on what kind of situation you're in. This vocab is just the same, making this <vocabulary>dealing with</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>treatment</vocabulary.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
